Want to borrow big fan(s) (Boulder)

350 31st St. at 350 31st St.

(google map) (yahoo map)

Hi, I am an engineering student involved in a group project to build a residential scale wind turbine. I am hoping to locate a couple of big fans that I could borrow. Looking for 36" Industrial fan or similar, so that we can test our turbine and different blades/loads in a controlled wind stream. We are trying to do this project as inexpensively as possible, so are hoping to borrow instead of rent/buy. I would be happy to put up collateral while we are using the fan(s), and can assure you they would be well taken care of, and used very lightly. If helping out some students on a budget sounds like your gig, then please get in touch!
Thank you,
Tim
